grammar.item: Why do you need to know?
I don't want to give it!

prompt.item: Would you like to find a specific style of shoe?
Please tell me the style you would like then.
Ok great what style would you like?
What can I do for you?
I'm not sure what you mean. I can understand things like Show me recent PG13-rated Action movies.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
Did you find what you were looking for, {User_Name}?
Oh no. Do you want to try again?
Okay. What can I do for you?
This is fun, but wouldn't you like to look up some movies?
I'm afraid I can't look up movies by {Topic}, only by Genre or MPAA Rating.
I'm afraid I can't look up {Topic}, only Current and Upcoming movies by Genre or MPAA Rating.
I'm afraid {Topic} isn't a movie genre I know. Please try another one.
I'm afraid I cannot look up showtimes myself, but I can give you a link to Fandango.com where you can buy tickets in your ZIP code.
I'm afraid I cannot look up theaters myself, but I can give you a link to Fandango.com where you can buy tickets in your ZIP code.
I'm afraid I cannot find movie reviews or search by number of stars at this time.
Action, adventure, animated, comedy, crime, documentary, drama, family, fantasy, foreign, historical, horror, music, mystery, romance, science fiction, TV movie, thriller, war movies and western.
I'm afraid I cannot look up Old Movies, only Current and Upcoming.

I can look up current and upcoming movies by Genre or MPAA Rating and show you trailers for them. But I'm afraid I cannot search by number of stars or by movie titles or actor and director names at this time.
After searching for movies, you can click on a particular movie result to watch its trailer, or video preview.
I'm sorry I don't know about that. Can I look up some movies for you?
I'm afraid I don't know much about {Topic}. Just movies.
When you get the details for a movie, you can save the movie in your Favorites by clicking on the heart icon above the trailer.
After searching for movies, you can click on a particular movie result to see details, such as rating, summary and trailer.
Do you prefer a certain style?
For example.... Boots, High heels, Sandals, Trainers or Flats
Please tell me the style you would prefer.
Do you prefer a certain color?
Black, White, Red, Brown or Green
I'm afraid I found {results_count} matching {Color_Preference} {Style_Preference}. Try changing your criteria.
Good choice, {User_Name}! I found {results_count} results for {Recency_Preference} {Color_Preference}-rated movies.
Good choice, {User_Name}! I found {results_count} results for {Color_Preference} {Style_Preference} movies.
I found {results_count} results for ALL {Recency_Preference} movies.
Good choices, {User_Name}! I found {results_count} results for {Color_Preference} {Style_Preference} movies.
Is there anything else I can help you with?
These are the {Recency_Preference} movies. Go ahead and click one!
Oh. You mean movies in your area. I must direct you to Fandango for that. Would you like the link?
There should be a short description of {Selected_Movie} to the right.
No. Say show me more if you want to see more.
Yes. I'm afraid that's all of them.
"{Search_Now:"{Search_Now}", Color:"{Color_Preference}", Style:"{Style_Preference}", Index:"{Current_Index}", Page:"{Page}", Total_Movies:"{results_count}", Total_Pages:"{Total_Pages}"}"
Here is the next set of results
Here is the previous set of results
Great choice! That gets fabulous ratings.
That's a good one! You will love it.
I hear that's a really good movie!
Hmm, I hear that's not such a great movie.
Um, that one gets low ratings.
Are you sure about that? The ratings are terrible.
Fantastic! So glad to hear it.
You're very polite, but don't you want me to look up movies for you?
You're very polite, but don't you want me to look up movies for you?
Say Never mind or nvm to start over. Say okay or thanks if my response is acceptable. Say What does X mean? for a definition of X. Say got to go or bye when you're finished.
The genre is the category of movie, like Drama, Comedy, Action, etc.

The rating is a recommendation by the Motion Picture Association of America about the suitability of a movie's content for particular age groups. For example, G is for general audiences, while R is restricted to people 17 and older.
G stands for General Audience and is appropriate for everyone.
PG-13 means Parents Strongly Cautioned or that some material may not be suitable for children under 13 years old.
PG stands for Parental Guidance, which means that some material may not be suitable for children.
NR stands for Not Rated and means that the film has not yet been rated by the MPAA.
R stands for Restricted and means that children under 17 must be accompanied by parent or adult guardian.
Current movies are those that have been playing for the past 28 days.
Upcoming movies are those that will come out within the next 6 months.
I'm afraid I don't have definitions of the different genres.
I'm sorry, please repeat it for me.
I'm sorry, English is my second language. My native tongue is Binary. 01110011 01101111 01110010 01110010 01111001

var.description: Did the user find what s/he was looking for?
var.name: Request_Success

var.description: Has the system already said goodbye?
var.name: Terminal_Exchange

var.description: How many times a user says "hi" or "howareyou"
var.name: Greeting_Count

var.description: How many times User engages Small Talk sequences
var.name: Small_Talk_Count

var.description: How many times User engages out-of-scope sequences
var.name: Out-of-Scope_Count

var.description: User's first time using the app.
var.name: First_Time

var.description: Tells backend when to call the movie API
var.name: Search_Now

var.description: Style of the shoe being searched for
var.name: Style_Preference

var.description: Color of the shoe being searched for
var.name: Color_Preference

var.description: For paging search results: new, next, previous, repeat
var.name: Page

var.description: Current date Time for US ET
var.name: DateTime_Current
